member.name: M:CDR.Register.Admin.API.Controllers.LoopbackController.MockDataRecipientJwks
member.summary: This controller action provides an implementation of a JWKS for a Mock Data Recipient.

member.name: M:CDR.Register.Admin.API.Controllers.LoopbackController.MockDataRecipientClientAssertion
member.summary: This controller action produces a client assertion for a mock data recipient.
member.remarks: This client assertion can then be used in a private key jwt request.

member.name: M:CDR.Register.Admin.API.Controllers.LoopbackController.RegisterSelfSignedJwt(System.String)
member.summary: This controller action produces a self signed JWT for the mock register.

member.name: M:CDR.Register.Admin.API.Startup.RunMigrations
member.summary: Determine if EF Migrations should run.
